content: this classic spencer not only brightens up your outfit but also provides that little bit of extra warmth when the weather is cool the spencer is knitted in stockinette stitch and features a ribbed panel in the center of the front that splits into the v-neck tip shine during the holidays with the glam spencer too yarn durable glam 75% cotton & 25% polyester 50 g / 130 m color a 321 navy 8 8 9 9 balls design kristina de barse
